## DurablePromise.catch() method

Attaches a callback for only the rejection of the Promise Triggers execution if not already started

**Signature:**

```typescript
catch<TResult = never>(onrejected?: ((reason: unknown) => TResult | PromiseLike<TResult>) | undefined | null): Promise<T | TResult>;
```
